title: 3: No Such Thing As The Middle Ages
content: This week QI Elves Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland) and James Harkin (@jamesharkin) are joined by Horrible Histories consultant Greg Jenner (@gregjenner) and comedian Alex Edelman (@alexedelman) to discuss the first recorded smile, the most important animal in America and 300 years that may never have happened.
contentSnippet: This week QI Elves Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland) and James Harkin (@jamesharkin) are joined by Horrible Histories consultant Greg Jenner (@gregjenner) and comedian Alex Edelman (@alexedelman) to discuss the first recorded smile, the most important animal in America and 300 years that may never have happened.
